elements.text:
You and your friends are out getting dinner. Your food and drinks arrive, and you accidentally spill your drink down the front of your new white shirt.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

text: I'm so annoyed with myself, but am able to get past this feeling.
I'm feeling silly and decide to chuckle about it.
I'm self-conscious with this stain, but no one else will care.
I feel embarrassed and it's making me want to leave the mall.
I'm glad that this is an old shirt.
